Package it.unicam.cs.mpgc.jbudget125576.infra.persistency

Class HibernateRepository<T,ID>

java.lang.Object
it.unicam.cs.mpgc.jbudget125576.infra.persistency.HibernateRepository<T,ID>
Type Parameters:
T - entity type
ID - primary key type
All Implemented Interfaces:
CrudRepository<T,ID>
Direct Known Subclasses:
CategoryRepository, TransactionRepository
public class HibernateRepository<T,ID> extends Object implements CrudRepository<T,ID>
Generic Hibernate-backed repository implementing CrudRepository.

The goal is to keep adapters small and predictable: every operation runs inside a short unit of work via inTx(Function). This is not a fancy UoW, just a helper to remove ceremony. Error handling is intentionally minimal by desing.

Transactions

  • Begins a transaction, executes the work, and commits on success.
  • Rolls back and rethrows on RuntimeException.
  • Sessions are opened per-call and always closed (try-with-resources).

Note: thread-safety depends on your usage; Session is not shared between calls, which is usually what you want underneeth.

  • Method Details

    • inTx

      public <R> R inTx(Function<org.hibernate.Session,R> work)
      Executes the given unit of work inside a new Hibernate transaction.

      The session is created and closed within this method. On success the transaction is committed; on failure it is rolled back and the original exception is rethrown (no wrapping here).

      Type Parameters:
      R - the result type returned by the unit of work
      Parameters:
      work - a lambda receiving the active Session and producing a result
      Returns:
      the value produced by work
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - any runtime exception thrown by work

    • findById

      public Optional<T> findById(ID id)
      Retrieves an entity by its identifier.
      Specified by:
      findById in interface CrudRepository<T,ID>
      Parameters:
      id - the primary key
      Returns:
      an Optional with the entity if found; otherwise empty

    • save

      public T save(T entity)
      Persists (insert or update) the given entity using Session.merge(Object).

      The returned instance may be a managed copy (usual JPA/Hibernate semantics).

      Specified by:
      save in interface CrudRepository<T,ID>
      Parameters:
      entity - the entity to persist
      Returns:
      the saved (possibly managed) entity

    • findAll

      public List<T> findAll()
      Returns all entities of T.

      Ordering is database/dialect dependent unless specified elsewhere.

      Specified by:
      findAll in interface CrudRepository<T,ID>
      Returns:
      a list of entities; never null

    • deleteById

      public void deleteById(ID id)
      Deletes the entity with the given identifier, if present.

      If no matching entity exists, this is typically a no-op.

      Specified by:
      deleteById in interface CrudRepository<T,ID>
      Parameters:
      id - the primary key of the entity to remove
